title: Thumbnails and Titles redirect to VPP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is looking at a video that isn't playing
AND the video thumbnail is square (rectangular means it will play on the page. We are looking for a redirecting thumbnail)
- Homepage: https://www.mlb.com
- Club: https://www.mlb.com/bluejays
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13192)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the video title OR thumbnail
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail OR title should redirect to the VPP (v1 currently)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13193)

title: Drawer Video | Autoplays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on one of the following places
- Homepage: https://www.mlb.com
- Club: https://www.mlb.com/mets
- Scores: https://www.mlb.com/scores (Will return to the poster, not the leave-behind)
custom_steps: WHEN the page finishes loading
custom_expected:
THEN the first video under the main carousel should begin autoplaying (The drawer player)
AND when the asset finishes, 
1. ON CLUB/HP, bring the user to the leave-behind list 
2. ON Scores, bring the user to the preview poster for that embed player

- Known issue: Autoplay videos are muted by default on mobile/web, but mobile can't play audio unless the user again clicks the video once. Simply clicking fullscreen, the audio will look on but will be 100% stuck muted until you exit fullscreen, then tap the video once. There is a separate case for this

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13186)

title: Drawer Video | No X on autoplay (Except Scores)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the HP mediawall
- Homepage: https://www.mlb.com
- Club: https://www.mlb.com/tigers
custom_steps: WHEN the main video autoplays
custom_expected:
THEN it shouldn't have an X on it (EXCEPT on /scores)
AND all other non-autoplay video including the autoplay one on https://www.mlb.com/scores should have an X![](index.php?/attachments/get/13187)

title: HP Mixed Feed | Condensed Preview Poster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on one of the following homepages
Homepage: https://www.mlb.com
Club: https://www.mlb.com/cubs
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down the Mixed feed to one of the items tagged "Video"

AND the VIDEO tag should overlap the preview poster slightly (similar to News/Cut4/etc)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13196)

title: HP Mixed Feed | Video Expands on Click/Collapses on Conclusion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the mixed feed
- Homepage: https://www.mlb.com
- Club: https://www.mlb.com/cardinals
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to an item tagged Video
AND the user clicks play
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13197)
custom_expected:
THEN the video should expand to a normal size
AND the VIDEO tag should shift below the player so as to not overlap it anymore
AND media should begin playing without issue
AND conclusion should collapse the video back to the 5:2 ratio
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13198)

title: Preroll | Autoplay muted/Nonautoplay unmuted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on a section of the site with video
- Homepage: https://www.mlb.com/
- Club: https://www.mlb.com/giants
- Scores: https://www.mlb.com/scores

AND the user does not have adblock enabled
custom_steps: WHEN a video is playing
custom_expected:
THEN video should be unmuted by default for non-autoplay media (due to user interaction with the player)
AND video should be muted by default for autoplay media (due to user interaction with the player)

Known issue: Autoplay videos are muted by default on mobile/web, but mobile can't play audio unless the user again clicks the video once. Simply clicking fullscreen, the audio will look on but will be 100% stuck muted until you exit fullscreen, then tap the video once. There is a separate case for this

title: Clubs | Club URL Behavior
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the VPP
AND the Link has a club name in it
Ex: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/mets/video
custom_steps: WHEN the page loads
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see
1. Team logo in the top-left
2. "Back to [teamname].com" text in the top-left
3. Clicking a tag should keep /teamname/ in the URL (Ex: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/mets/video/search/tag/Midseason%20Report)
4. Entering a search should keep /teamname/ in the URL (Ex: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/mets/video/search?q=Midseason+Report)
5. Clicking a playlist carousel should keep /teamname/ in the URL (Ex: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/mets/video/recap-nym-6-stl-5/c-1587806183?tid=8878556)
6. Clicking a playlist from the dropdown should keep /teamname/ in the URL (Ex: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/mets/video/t-19005548)

title: Social Sharing
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the VPP
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to share an asset
custom_expected:
THEN the user will get the following behavior
- Facebook: Opens new window, asking user to post the video link and metadata
- Twitter: Opens new window, asking user to post the link
- Email: Opens a blank tab (known bug), then email application with the title and a link to the video
- Embed Link: <iframe src='https://www.mlb.com/video/share/statcast-judges-line-drive-hr/c-1571091183?tid=6479266' width='540' height='360'></iframe>
- Copy Link: https://www.mlb.com/video/statcast-judges-line-drive-hr/c-1571091183?tid=6479266

Known issues
- Overlap on Embed/Copy Sharing: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WMI-2471
- Email share puts content below your signature: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WMI-2561
 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/17190)

title: Edward Jones Livestream | Incompatible Browser (Safari, IE, Edge)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a livestream is running
EX: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/video/t-240569582
